activities: Wix receives personal information from visitors that choose to provide such information on the Wix website and websites hosted on the Wix service, such as by submitting their names and contact information at registration or by choosing to disclose and/or post information to the website. In addition, Wix may collect certain information automatically from all visitors, including IP address, in order to provide and improve our services.

recoursemech:
